page.title: 15KEELBY LIBRARY
page.content: The village library opened in November 1982.It used to be the school.Part of the building is now used as the Youth Club.The building is made of brick and has a slate roof.It was built in 1879. There are two ladies who work there ,one park time and one full time.They have also got one cleaner.The library is open fourteen hours a week.About two thousand people belong to the library and there are about seven thousand books.All the reference books are numbered.The subjects on which they have most books are sport and cookery.The greatest number of books you can have is 6.If you are a child and have an overdue book , you get a card in the post telling you to bring your library book back but if you get out adults books and they are overdue you must pay some money.It's good to have a library in Keelby.
